edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit

Class CircuitCreationValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.circuits.garbledCircuit.CircuitCreationValues

  • public class CircuitCreationValues
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that hold the values used to create the circuit.

    These values are:

    1. Both keys of the input and the output wires.

    2. The translation table of the circuit.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
